meanings.sent1: The soup was blander than plain water.
meanings.sent2: The plain rice was even blander than the boiled chicken.
meanings.sent3: The party was so bland that even the balloons seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: Her blander personality made her fade into the background.
meanings.sent5: The blander the food, the more salt people added to it.

meanings.definition: Making something less interesting or exciting
meanings.sent1: The new paint color made the room look blander.
meanings.sent2: The blander movie ending disappointed the audience.
meanings.sent3: His jokes became blander as the night went on.
meanings.sent4: The blander music choice drained the energy from the party.
meanings.sent5: Her blander outfit made her blend in with the crowd.
